EmailTemplate.name: Azure_Cold_Nurture.Azure_Cold_Nurture_Email_1
EmailTemplate.subject: Are you moving to Microsoft Azure?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/microsoft-and-turbonomic/7-days-to-azure?utm_campaign=70157000001bY5vAAE]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Too many organizations that move to the cloud struggle to meet their migration deadlines due to inaccurate assessments and outdated capacity planning techniques. It doesn't have to be this way for you and your team. Check out our video <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/microsoft-and-turbonomic/7-days-to-azure?utm_campaign=70157000001bY5vAAE]]> to learn more about how you can execute a smooth migration to Azure with Turbonomic.
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/microsoft-and-turbonomic/7-days-to-azure?utm_campaign=70157000001bY5vAAE]]>
Through full-stack automation, powered by a trustworthy decision-engine, Turbonomic enables IT organizations to optimize workloads before moving them to Azure. Once in the cloud, Turbonomic's continuous optimization allows teams to save up to 70% on their cloud bill without relying on manual effort.
Learn more <[[https://turbonomic.com/request-a-demo?utm_id=70157000001bY5vAAE]]>about how we can help.
Regards, Team Turbonomic
